itunes:title: Episode 614 - The Veteran Who Disarmed A Rioter During Seattle Protest
title: Episode 614 - The Veteran Who Disarmed A Rioter During Seattle Protest
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway chat with "Rughi", the Marine Corps veteran turned security contractor, who asked that his name not be used for security reasons, that unintentionally took the internet by storm after a video surfaced of him disarming a Se...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway chat with "Rughi", the Marine Corps veteran turned security contractor, who asked that his name not be used for security reasons, that unintentionally took the internet by storm after a video surfaced of him disarming a Seattle rioter who had stolen a police officer’s AR-15 from a destroyed squad car Saturday. Shout out to Joshua Skovlund for his article on coffeeordie.com for shedding some light on this story.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
